## DurableOperation.getChainedInvokeDetails() method

Gets the details for a chained invoke operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getChainedInvokeDetails(): ChainedInvokeDetails<TResult> | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

[ChainedInvokeDetails](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.chainedinvokedetails.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; \| undefined

The chained invoke operation details, or undefined if no operation data is available

## Exceptions

Will throw an error if the operation type is not CHAINED_INVOKE
